this is the most beautiful place in Ontario, A must see for anyone living here or visiting. It is magically beautiful and peaceful. The colors are phenomenal.

We visited the park during the winter holidays hoping to see Indian Head cove and the grotto covered in snow.The roads into the park are maintained, however only parking lot 2 is accessible as parking lot 1 (the closer one) is blocked off during the winter season. Beautiful nature, great geological formations, and lots of different trails to enjoy, from tiny for half an hour to long for a couple of weeks/months to tread by foot.

Aside from the beautiful vistas the Bruce trails offer something for everyone. Difficult rocky climbing, longer rocky & root exposed trails and smooth wheel chair accessible trails.
